channel.title: Computer Vision on Tafreed Ahmad
channel.description: Recent content in Computer Vision on Tafreed Ahmad

item.title: The YOLOv8 Edge: Harnessing Custom Datasets for Superior Real-time Detection
item.description: This paper presents a YOLOv8-based custom object detection model, evaluating its effectiveness on real-time video streams for robotics and other applications.

item.title: Influencing Factors in Facial Recognition and Verification: A Siamese Neural Network Hyperparameter Study
item.description: This study explores optimizing hyperparameters for Siamese neural networks to improve facial recognition performance, focusing on optimizers, loss functions, and data preprocessing techniques.
